title: True Foods Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is centered on the principals of Dr. Andrew Weil's Anti-Inflammatory Diet & Food Pyramid, with several ovo/lacto vegetarian dishes and a few vegan ones, marked. Modern decor. The organic tomato & roasted vegetable pizza is made without cow cheese.
streetAddress: 15191 N Scottsdale Rd, Unit 100 Bldg G
